translation.en: The future--
The polar ice caps have melted, covering the earth with water.
translation.ja: 極地の氷が解け 地表は水で覆われた

translation.en: Those who survived have adapted... to a new world.
translation.ja: 生き残った人間は 新しい世界に適応した

translation.en: Bad luck, English.
But the Slavers are producing a good grade of poxy these days.
translation.ja: スレイバーから 上等の部品を買え

translation.en: Cost you a handful of dirt. Or maybe that wind chime.
translation.ja: 一握りの土か風鈴と交換だ

translation.en: - What are you doin' here? - Just waiting.
translation.ja: ここで何を？ 風を待ってる

translation.en: Take your hand off the sail.
Take it off!
I've seen your boat before. Haven't seen you.
translation.ja: その船は見たことあるが お前のじゃない

translation.en: Took it legal.
Previous owner was dead on the tiller when I found it.
translation.ja: 見つけた時 乗員は死んでた

translation.en: You had another hour before I traded up again.
translation.ja: その船と交換しようかと

translation.en: Just improving my means.
Well, I owe you then. No, thanks.
translation.ja: 忠告どうも いいんだ

translation.en: I got all the supplies I need. Just came from an atoll.
translation.ja: 必需品は持ってる 環礁(アトール)があった

translation.en: Eight days east, if you're interested.
- Two drifters meet, something needs to be exchanged. - I know the code.
translation.ja: 何か交換する物は？ 今の情報を―

translation.en: But I'll give you this one for free.
Nothing's free in Waterworld.
Yeah.
Smokers.
Just enough wind to get away clean.
translation.ja: 風はある　逃げよう

translation.en: Forget the bag.
It's not worth it. You'll never make it with your sails down.
translation.ja: 帆を張ってたら間に合わない

translation.en: Hey!
What can I say?
- Joe, he's goin' for it. - What the hell?
translation.ja: 取る気だ 何なんだ？

translation.en: Never seen that before.
Here we go! Go! Drive! Drive!
translation.ja: 行くぞ　ぶっ飛ばせ！

translation.en: Faster! Faster! Whoo!
Come on! He's gonna get it! He's gonna get it!
Pick her up! Get it! Get it!
Oh, no!
Inbound! Straight out from the gates.
translation.ja: 船だ　ゲートの真正面

translation.en: English.
Flag's down, drifter. We got enough traders.
translation.ja: 要らないよ　物は豊富だ

translation.en: Dirt.
Open the gates!
Bones to berries.
Veins to vine.
These tendon to trees. This blood to brine.
translation.ja: 腱(けん)は樹木に 血液は塩水になる

translation.en: Too old she was.
This woman does leave us, recycled and enshrined...
translation.ja: 我々の元を離れ 再生される

translation.en: in the presence of him who leads us.
translation.ja: 我々を導きし者によって

translation.en: -  - What is that?
You know me?
I know what you are.
Good. Then you know if you look for trouble while you're here,
translation.ja: よし ここじゃ面倒を起こすなよ

translation.en: you'll find more than you can handle.
translation.ja: ここじゃ面倒を起こすなよ

translation.en: You got two hours.
I'll only need one.
He's comin' over here.
Me. You each get one...
translation.ja: 僕だ 見張ってたら 皆にやる

translation.en: if everything's here when I get back.
translation.ja: 見張ってたら 皆にやる

translation.en: Pure dirt.
Three point two kilos.
How'd you come by so much of it?
Another atoll, 30 horizons west of here.
translation.ja: はるか西の環礁(アトール)だ

translation.en: Where'd they get it?
They didn't say.  We heard about that place--
translation.ja: 聞かなかった ウワサじゃ―

translation.en: heard they was all killed.
- That's why they didn't say. - Smokers?
translation.ja: そうとも スモーカーか？

translation.en: Maybe Smokers, maybe Slavers.
translation.ja: さあな　スレイバーかも

translation.en: So what's the word? We tradin' or not?
translation.ja: どうする？　交換するか？

translation.en: We'll tally it like, uh, pure hydro.
translation.ja: 計算する 真水と同じだ

translation.en: Works out to... 62 chits.
I want twice that.
I just want one sip of hydro. No, not till you tell me.
translation.ja: 水を一口くれ その前に話せ

translation.en: She got inkings on her back. I seen her.
translation.ja: その子の背中に印が付いてた

translation.en: They say if you read the marks on the child,
translation.ja: その印の意味が分かれば―

translation.en: they'll lead ya all the way to Dryland.
translation.ja: ドライランドが見つかる

translation.en: Dryland's a myth. Some still believe.
translation.ja: 伝説だろ 信じる者もいる

translation.en: They say the Smokers even got an eye out for her.
translation.ja: スモーカーも彼女を探してる

translation.en: Well, then, we better keep it to ourselves.
translation.ja: なら俺たちだけの 秘密にしよう

translation.en: - Help you? - Yeah.
Where's the store? You found it.
You don't have much.
You the man with the dirt?
Skoal.
- One more. - Make it two.
A man this rich will buy for a fellow outwater, I'm sure.
translation.ja: 金持ちなら仲間におごれ

translation.en: One.
That's an interesting pair of boots you got.
Trade? No.
Shame.
Enola. Hey, what are you doing?
translation.ja: エノーラ　何してるの？

translation.en: No, you can't have it. I need another piece. I want to draw some more.
translation.ja: ダメよ 書くものが欲しいの

translation.en: I'll get it to you. Just stay in the back.
With all those chits, you could order up a bath.
translation.ja: その金で風呂も入れる

translation.en: Have you ever had a freshwater bath?
translation.ja: その金で風呂も入れる 経験あるか？

translation.en: Why are you talkin' to me? Just being friendly.
translation.ja: なぜ話しかける？ 仲良くしたい

translation.en: - Is that a tomato plant? - Yeah.
You have a keen eye.
translation.ja: そうよ　目ざといわね

translation.en: Saw one in a picture. How much?
translation.ja: 写真で見た　いくらだ？

translation.en: Half your chits.
I'll take them too. Take what?
You bought everything. I'll take them shelves.
translation.ja: これだけよ あの棚だよ

translation.en: So, what did you see out there in your 15 months?
translation.ja: あなたは15ヵ月で 何を見たの？

translation.en: Such as? An end to all this water.
translation.ja: 何って？ 海の果てとか

translation.en: Askin' the wrong person.
The one they buried today? Uh- huh?
She found the only end there is.
I've got a proposition for you, Mariner.
translation.ja: 頼みがある　海の男(マリナー)

translation.en: I'm not staying. We're not asking you to. All we want is your seed.
translation.ja: すぐ発つ 欲しいのは あなたの種なの

translation.en: We can look to our own for impregnation,
translation.ja: 娘に子供を産ませたい

translation.en: but too much of that sort of thing gets... undesirable.
translation.ja: だが新しい種を 植えなければならん

translation.en: When she's pregnant, you go on your way... with all the supplies you need.
translation.ja: 妊娠させてくれたら 何でもあげるわ

translation.en: You don't have anything. You're dying.
translation.ja: じきに死ぬのに何がある？

translation.en: No man stays out that long and turns down a woman.
translation.ja: 長く独りでいたのに 女を断るとは

translation.en: He's hiding something. Maybe he's a Smoker spy.
translation.ja: 何か隠してる スモーカーのスパイかも

translation.en: When the elders say so, you can leave... and not before.
translation.ja: 長老たちが許すまで 出ていくな

translation.en: Gills.
- Mutation! - He's a mutant!
translation.ja: 両生人間(ミュータント)だ！ 彼はミュータントだ！

translation.en: My hand!
Throw the nets!
By what right--
You pay me to keep the peace.
This isn't it.
- He has killed one of ours. - He was defending himself.
translation.ja: １人 殺したぞ 正当防衛だ

translation.en: - He needs to be destroyed! - Kill him.
That may be-- Let's kill him.
but not here and not like this.
translation.ja: だが ここでなく 別の方法でだ

translation.en: What is it?
It's tied. I can't get it off.
Open the gate.
Is it a map?
You'd tell me if you knew, wouldn't you, Enola? Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: 知ってたら教えてくれ

translation.en: - What are you drawing? - I don't know.
translation.ja: 何を描いてる？ 知らない

translation.en: Helen, look. Look at the prodigal child's latest vision.
translation.ja: ヘレン この子の絵を見てくれ

translation.en: How soon before we can leave?
Helen, I don't have any idea yet where we can go.
translation.ja: どこに行けるか分からん

translation.en: I haven't figured out the tattoo on her back.
translation.ja: 背中のタトゥーの意味もだ

translation.en: I'm a stupid man. The answer's right there.
translation.ja: 答えは目の前にあるのに―

translation.en: It's just beyond me.
Maybe he knows.
Oh, yes, I see. They are webbed.
translation.ja: 驚いたな　水かきがある

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten digits. That's wonderful.
translation.ja: １ ２ ３… 指は10本だ 同じだな

translation.en: They tell me too that you have gills.
Isotropic gills. Are they merely vestigial or are they functional now?
translation.ja: ただの痕跡か？ 使える器官か？

translation.en: My name is Gregor. I've just come to pay you a little vi-- vi--
translation.ja: 私はグレゴール 君にあいさつを…

translation.en: Oh, my God.
I'm sorry. I'm not laughing at you.
I'm excited. Your gills. They're functional.
translation.ja: そのエラは使える器官だ

translation.en: Ichthyus sapien. You can breathe in the water.
translation.ja: 水中で呼吸ができるんだな

translation.en: How deep can you go?
Look, I'm only here because I want to learn more about you.
translation.ja: 私は君について 知りたくて来たんだ

translation.en: You don't like humans very much, do you?
I can't say that I blame you. But tell me--
translation.ja: 無理もない 君の仲間は 怒りっぽいのか？

translation.en: Are all of your kind as bad- tempered as you are?
translation.ja: 君の仲間は 怒りっぽいのか？

translation.en: - I have no kind. - Oh, fish rot.
translation.ja: 仲間はいない ウソつけ

translation.en: I'd be surprised if there weren't others, and if there aren't,
translation.ja: いないはずない これから増えるだろう

translation.en: there will be eventually.
translation.ja: これから増えるだろう

translation.en: Anyway, I've come here because I need to ask you a question.
translation.ja: ともかく １つ尋ねたいんだ

translation.en: Where-- Where did your dirt come from?
translation.ja: 君はあの土を どこから持ってきた？

translation.en: Is it from Dryland?
Do you know what this is?
The ancients-- They did something terrible, didn't they?
To cause all this water. Hundreds-- Hundreds of years ago.
translation.ja: 数百年前 地球を水浸しにした

translation.en: If I tell you, will you open this lock?
I haven't a key.
There's a mooring cleat down there. What?
Good as any key. A mooring cleat?
translation.ja: 鍵の代わりだ 金具？

translation.en: I won't hurt anyone. I'll just leave.
translation.ja: 誰も傷つけずに逃げる

translation.en: - I'll be right back. -  Gregor!
translation.ja: すぐ戻る グレゴール！

translation.en: What's your business there?
translation.ja: そこで何してる？　戻れ

translation.en: Move along! I'm not a brave man.
translation.ja: そこで何してる？　戻れ 勇気がない

translation.en: If you know anything about Dryland, please tell me. Please.
translation.ja: ドライランドのことを 知ってるなら話してくれ

translation.en: Don't let it die with you.
No, no, no, no. Stop!
Gregor! Move along!
translation.ja: よせ　やめるんだ！ グレゴール　戻ってこい

translation.en: After considerable deliberation of the evidence at hand,
translation.ja: 目の前にある証拠を 詳細に検討した結果―

translation.en: it is our decision that this mute- o... does, indeed, constitute a threat.
translation.ja: このミュータントは 脅威であると決定した

translation.en: Therefore, in the interest of public safety,
translation.ja: 故に 我々の安全のため―

translation.en: he is hereby sentenced to be recycled... in the customary fashion.
translation.ja: この男を通例の方法で 再生利用の刑に処す

translation.en: Proceed.
I'm sorry.
Bones to berries.
Veins to vines.
His tendons to trees. His blood to brine.
translation.ja: 腱は樹木に 血液は塩水になる

translation.en: Too strange for life, he was.
translation.ja: 彼は異常な生物だった

translation.en: This mute- o now does leave us,
translation.ja: このミュータントは― 再生利用され葬られる

translation.en: recycled and entombed,
translation.ja: 再生利用され葬られる

translation.en: in the presence of him who leads us.
translation.ja: 我々を導きし者によって

translation.en: Smokers! Dead out of the sun!
translation.ja: スモーカーだ！ 太陽の方角から

translation.en: To your posts!
- Kill! - There!
We are safe behind these walls.
translation.ja: 壁に守られてる　安全だ

translation.en: Aren't we?
Let me out! I'll fight!
translation.ja: 出してくれ　俺も戦う

translation.en: Give me the key to the city now.
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Floor it! Floor it! Floor it!
translation.ja: 撃って撃って撃ちまくれ！

translation.en: Swab it! Swab it!
Goddamn! More ammo!
translation.ja: もっと弾を持ってこい

translation.en: Break down the door!
We'll have this atoll in no time.
Crank it! Crank it!
Look!
Look out!
Oh, no!
Keep that gas goin'! Fill 'em up!
-  -  Helen, come quickly!
Helen!
You're not supposed to go yet!
Infernal machine!
Gregor. Gregor, wait!
translation.ja: グレゴール　待って！

translation.en: Helen, I tried. There was an accident. I can't make it stop. Hurry!
translation.ja: 事故なんだ　止められない

translation.en: You can make it if you try. Run! Up the stairs. Run! Quickly!
translation.ja: 階段を駆け上がるんだ 急いでくれ

translation.en: - Wait! Wait! - I'll throw you a rope. Run quickly!
translation.ja: 階段を駆け上がるんだ 急いでくれ 待って ロープを投げるぞ

translation.en: Throw the rope now. Run, Enola. Slow down! Wait!
translation.ja: どこ行くの？　待って

translation.en: Throw the rope. No! No! Wait!
translation.ja: ロープを… 届かない 待って

translation.en: -  Gregor, don't leave us! - Oh, no!
I'm sorry! It was an accident!
translation.ja: ごめん　事故だったんだ

translation.en: Helen! Enola! Helen, I'm sorry!
translation.ja: ヘレン　エノーラ　すまない

translation.en: Shoot him. Shoot him.
If I let you out of here, you're taking us with you.
Sure.
Enola, get down.
Here. Get over here. Get down.
Hurry! Come on!
Get the gate.
Run!
Hurry up!
Kamikazes. Come on!
That made a hole.
Find her! Get the girl!
There!
Go get that guy! Go! Kill him!
translation.ja: あいつを撃て　殺せ！

translation.en: Wow. Enola!
-  You're too slow! - Run to the other side.
translation.ja: 遅すぎるぞ 反対側へ

translation.en: -  - Come on!
Grab on! Hold on, hold on.
translation.ja: つかんで　離さないで

translation.en: It's stuck! I can't make it through!
- Let her go! -
Just drop her!
Turn the wheel. The wheel! Turn it!
That! Come on. Push it.
I am! Hurry! Now pull!
translation.ja: やってる！ 引っ張って

translation.en: Push it! Push it hard! Push it hard!
Okay, okay! Now pull this! Pull this!
translation.ja: 次はこれを引っ張って

translation.en: Pull! Pull it! Hurry!
-  - Enola, jump.
Jump. Look at me. Jump! Okay. Now!
translation.ja: エノーラ　跳ぶのよ

translation.en: Well, excuse me! Did I say anybody could leave before the battle was over?
translation.ja: おい　あれを見ろ １人でも逃がしていいと 言ったか？

translation.en: Did I? No! No!
translation.ja: １人でも逃がしていいと 言ったか？ いいえ

translation.en: Well, do somethin'. I hate sails.
Hey! Can you steer?
translation.ja: おい　舵をとれるか？

translation.en: Can I trust you?
Answer me this, somebody. Why is that boat still firin'?
translation.ja: おい こっちを撃つなよ

translation.en: What's that cousin's name? Chuck.
translation.ja: あいつの名は？ チャック

translation.en: - Hey, Chuck! -  He's pulling him right into us.
translation.ja: おい チャック こっちを撃つぞ

translation.en: Maybe he doesn't answer to Chuck. Call him Charles. Charlie!
translation.ja: 答えないぞ “チャールズ”と呼べ

translation.en: Stop him! Stop him!
translation.ja: 奴を止めろ　止めるんだ！

translation.en: Charles!
Adios, cousins.
She's here somewhere. Keep lookin'.
Stop it! No! Let me down!
What you got? Couple of heartbeats over there. Aren't sayin' much.
translation.ja: どうだ？ ２人の男を捕らえました

translation.en: If you'll notice the arterial nature of the blood comin' from the hole in my head,
translation.ja: 目の穴から 血が流れてるんだ

translation.en: you can assume that we're all havin' a real lousy day.
translation.ja: 今日はひどい１日だった 分かるだろ？

translation.en: So here it is-- I need to know about that tattooed girl.
translation.ja: タトゥーのガキについて 知りたいんだ

translation.en: First one that tells me lives.
- I saw a girl. I saw, I saw-- - It was-- Sh- She had a big tattoo on her.
translation.ja: 俺は見たよ 背中に大きなタトゥーがあった

translation.en: She had lots of--
translation.ja: 背中に大きなタトゥーがあった

translation.en: You won. Start over.
I saw a girl. I'm not sure,
but I think she got on a boat with three hulls.
translation.ja: 胴が３つの船で 逃げてったようだ

translation.en: The boat that cost me a thousand G's of go- juice? Yeah, the mute- o's boat.
translation.ja: ひどい目に遭わせた奴か ミュータントだ

translation.en: - Mute- o? - Yeah. He got these slits here,
translation.ja: ミュータント？ 耳の後ろに穴があった

translation.en: like--  like fish gills.
translation.ja: 耳の後ろに穴があった エラみたいな

translation.en: He wasn't really a man.
A fluke of evolution.
Oh, I'm sorry. A fluke of, uh--
- Evolution. - I know!
translation.ja: 突然変異 分かってる

translation.en: No! No, you said you wouldn't kill me! Did I say that?
translation.ja: 助けるって言ったろ 言ったか？ 証人がいるか？

translation.en: - Witnesses, anybody, did I? - Yes, yes, yes! You said--
translation.ja: 言ったか？ 証人がいるか？ そうとも

translation.en: You said it. Oh, I may have.
I may have.
We get to the 'Deez,
tank up that sky boat-- send it out on patrol.
We gotta keep an eye out... for that ichthy- freak.
translation.ja: 何としても見つけろ あの化け物野郎を

translation.en: You been there, haven't you?
Dryland?
You know where it is.
Yeah, I know where it is.
And, uh-- And we're going?
translation.ja: 私たち そこへ行くの？

translation.en: You and I are.
The kid we gotta pitch over the side.
- What? - My boat's tore up.
translation.ja: 何ですって？ 船は壊れた

translation.en: I'm takin' on water.
I'd be lucky to get half a hydro ration out of that.
You know-- I said I won't drink.
translation.ja: 言ったでしょ　私は我慢する

translation.en: For 12 days?
No. It's better one of you dies now... than both of you die slow.
translation.ja: 今どっちか殺さないと ２人とも死ぬぞ

translation.en: Wait. Wait.
We saved your life. We got you out.
No, you got me out so you could get out. We're even.
translation.ja: 君たちも逃げられた おあいこだ

translation.en: She can cook. She can fish.
So can I. Then take my necklace. Take my necklace.
translation.ja: 俺もだ ネックレスあげる

translation.en: I got better ones below. No, look!
After what you went through back there on the atoll,
translation.ja: ひどい目に遭ったから―

translation.en: I can understand why you would want to.
But she's a child.
Is there something else then?
Enola! Go below.
Enola.
Yeah. You said so yourself.
Been out there a long time.
Couple hours ago, I was potential dirt to you.
translation.ja: さっきまで見下してたろ

translation.en: We're not like that. You all are.
translation.ja: 私たちは違う 同じさ

translation.en: Know what I was really thinkin'?
Why I don't drop both of you in my wake right now.
You got nothin' I need.
You're taking us to Dryland.
Killing's a hard thing to do well.
- Believe me. I'm not the one to start on. - Both of us!
translation.ja: 特に俺はな 連れてって

translation.en: How long you plan to hold that on me?
As long as it takes.
- Okay. - No!
Let me out! Let me out of here!
Don't you touch my child!
translation.ja: どこにいるの？ 子供に触れないで

translation.en: Come here!
Okay, now don't move, okay? There.
Oh. Oh, lookin' real good, yeah.
There. There.
All done.
Now, there may be some small problem in depth perception.
translation.ja: 奥行きがよく分からないかも

translation.en: Well, it better not screw up my short game.
- Well? -  Looks good. I like it. Yeah.
translation.ja: どうだ？ 見栄えは悪くない

translation.en: - I like it better than your real eye. - Much better.
translation.ja: 実物よりも ずっといい

translation.en: What do you say, Toby? The truth. Looks like shit.
translation.ja: トビー　本当の感想を サイテー

translation.en: That's why I love children. No guile.
It does look like shit.
And it feels like cold shit.
Deacon? What--
I'm sorry. It- It's just that there's a problem in the pit.
translation.ja: 底の方で問題があるようだ

translation.en: Maybe you should come.
- Let's drive. -
The pit. Don't bother with the scenic route.
Drive!
Hey, it's drivin' better.
Get off!
Get over there. Get out of the way.
All right, all right, all right. Okay, okay.
You guys are great. Bless all you cousins over there.
translation.ja: お前らは最高だ 祝福しよう

translation.en: Keep up the good work. Growth is progress. Growth is progress.
translation.ja: いい仕事を続けろ 成長は進歩だ

translation.en: Somebody! Hey, up there!
Take it off!
- Yes. - Your Deaconship.
Hello. Good morning. Or night,
translation.ja: やあ　おはよう それとも“こんばんは”かな

translation.en: whichever the case may be.
translation.ja: それとも“こんばんは”かな

translation.en: What is it? I'm a busy man. I thought you should know.
translation.ja: 何だ？　俺は忙しい お知らせです

translation.en: We're down to exactly...
translation.ja: お知らせです 燃料の量が―

translation.ja: 私があなたに 身を投げ出した時―

translation.en: why didn't you take me?
'Cause you didn't really want me.
Not really.
Have I been asleep long?
I was dreaming.
It's funny.
I always thought Dryland floated.
translation.ja: ドライランドを浮島と

translation.en: That it drifted with the wind. That's why it was so hard to find.
translation.ja: だから見つからないと 思ってた

translation.en: Why did you believe in it so much?
Because we weren't made for the sea.
Got hands... and feet.
We're supposed to walk.
I miss her sound.
Don't you?
Helen!
He-- No, no, no. Helen, up here. Above you!
translation.ja: ヘレン　上だ　ここだよ

translation.en: -  -  Gregor!
Smart thinking to burn your boat.
translation.ja: よくぞ 船を焼いた

translation.en: Without the smoke, I never would have found you.
translation.ja: 煙がなければ 見つけられなかった

translation.en: Who's that with you?
Ichthyus Sapien, is that really you?
translation.ja: 水中で呼吸できる男か

translation.en: I'll throw the rope down. You catch it. I'll help you climb up.
translation.ja: ロープを下ろす 登ってこい

translation.en: Helen. Where's Enola?
translation.ja: ヘレン エノーラはどこだ？

translation.en: Smokers took her. They'd have me too if it weren't for him.
translation.ja: 連れ去られたの 私は彼に助けられた

translation.en: My friend, thank you. Very human of you.
translation.ja: 友よ ありがとう 何て いい人なんだ

translation.en: Go grab your things quickly. Quickly. Come.
translation.ja: 荷物を持って早く登れ

translation.en: You see? Right down there.
translation.ja: 見えるか？　あそこだ

translation.en: There's several of us survivors. We'll just start over again.
translation.ja: 生き残った者があそこにいる

translation.en: You can't ask us to go get her.
Enola's the reason we're in all this trouble.  Forget it. We're not going.
translation.ja: あの子のせいで 災難に遭ったのよ

translation.en: They don't have any reason to kill her. They need to find Dryland just like we do.
translation.ja: ドライランド発見のために 生かしてるはず

translation.en: - Of course. -  If the mariner's willing to go, why not us?
translation.ja: そうとも マリナーが行くわ　私たちも

translation.en: If he wants to go, then let him!
We don't want you here! You or the girl!
Helen. The papers the mariner brought you--
translation.ja: マリナーが 持ってきた文書だが―

translation.en: It's the same language the tattoo is written in. They're numbers.
translation.ja: タトゥーにあったのと 同じ言語だ　数字だよ

translation.en: Gregor, you're as crazy as she is!  We can't stay here!
translation.ja: お前もイカれてる ここはダメ

translation.en: We're wasting valuable time. More Smokers will come. We need to be moving now.
translation.ja: スモーカーが来る 移動しなくちゃ

translation.en: My friends, don't you see we need this child if we want to find Dryland?
translation.ja: ドライランド発見には あの子が必要だ

translation.en: I'm not goin'. Nobody is.
We've already seen their smoke on the horizon.
translation.ja: 誰もだ 水平線に煙が見えた

translation.en: Know what that is yet?
translation.ja: 水平線に煙が見えた 解読できたか？

translation.en: The numbers? Yes, I think I do.
translation.ja: 数字かい？　できたよ

translation.en: It seems to be some ancient form of geographic location-- latitude, longitude.
translation.ja: 昔の地理的位置を示してる 緯度と経度だろう

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, though. The numbers, they seem to be backwards or something.
translation.ja: 昔の地理的位置を示してる 緯度と経度だろう だが意味不明だ 数字の順序を変えてる

translation.en: It's upside down. The world?
translation.ja: 逆さなんだ 世界が？

translation.en: The poles have reversed themselves?
I've been mappin' the cities below.
The world wasn't created in a deluge. It was covered by it.
translation.ja: 世界は洪水で覆われたんだ

translation.en: -  That's blasphemy! -  No, it's true.
translation.ja: 神への冒涜(ぼうとく)だ 真実よ

translation.en: I've seen it with my own eyes. There is land. It's right under our keel.
translation.ja: 私は この目で見たわ 陸地は海底に沈んだ

translation.en: None of it's dry anymore. Some is.
translation.ja: もうないわ どこかにある

translation.en: Enola's been there. I know that now. I saw what she drew.
translation.ja: エノーラはそこにいた 絵を見たよ

translation.en: So that's why he's going after Enola-- to find Dryland.
translation.ja: ドライランドを探すため あの子を？

translation.en: I don't care about Dryland.
This is ridiculous. Going after the Smokers?
translation.ja: スモ－カーを追うなんて

translation.en: He doesn't even know which direction they came from.
I say let him go.  We're better off without them anyway!
translation.ja: 行かせりゃいい いなくても困らない

translation.en: If she's alive, I'll bring her back to you.
translation.ja: 生きてたら連れて帰る

translation.en: Forget about the mute- o, Helen. If he brings her back here, they'll kill us all!
translation.ja: 連れて帰ったら 奴らが殺しに来るよ

translation.en: I can't stand it. We gotta go help him. I can't ask him to do this alone.
translation.ja: 彼を助けるべきよ 一人じゃ行かせられない

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, my dear. You're not going to have to.
translation.ja: 心配するな 一人では行かせない

translation.en: You got that tattoo figured out yet?
It would be easier if it was flat-- big and flat.
translation.ja: 平らなら分かりやすいんだが

translation.en: It needs to be flat. What you got in mind?
translation.ja: 平らにしたい どうする？

translation.en: Well, you cut it off her back. You stretch it, mount it.
translation.ja: 背中から切り取り 伸ばせばいいんだ

translation.en: Give us a proper look. Take her down below until I holler.
translation.ja: 見やすくなる 下へ連れてけ

translation.en: Saint Joe, we're close.
translation.ja: 〝ヘーゼルウッド船長〞 〝ヘーゼルウッド船長〞 近づいたよ

translation.en: After centuries of shame.
They're gettin' ugly. Don't I know it.
translation.ja: 騒いでます 分かってる

translation.en: Announce me, cousin.
Hey. Here he is.
Deacon!
Rise up, brothers and sisters.
translation.ja: 立ち上がれ　兄弟姉妹たち！

translation.en: Turn your eyes and open your hearts... to your humble benefactor,
translation.ja: 目を向けよ　心を開け お前たちのリーダーに

translation.en: your spiritual shepherd and dictator for life,
translation.ja: 目を向けよ　心を開け お前たちのリーダーに 精神的な指導者にして君主

translation.en: the Deacon of the 'Deez.
translation.ja: ディーズのディーコンだ

translation.en: Look out! It's mine! It's mine!
Deacon! Wahoo!
Children. Children of the provider.
translation.ja: 諸君　我が子供たちよ

translation.en: Citizens of the good ship. Please now, hear me speak.
translation.ja: 良き船の市民たち 俺の話を聞け

translation.en: I've had a vision.  Yeah, we're tired of your visions!
translation.ja: 夢を見た 聞き飽きたよ

translation.en: What about the land you promised us?
O ye of little faith.
I've had a vision so great... that as it came to me, I wept.
translation.ja: あまりに壮大な夢なので 俺は泣いた

translation.en: - And in this splenditudinous figment of wonder, - Is that Bone's ride?
translation.ja: その偉大な夢は… 誰のだ？

translation.en: - Is that blood on the seat? - I saw--
translation.ja: 血が ついてるのか？

translation.en: And you know what it is that I saw.
translation.ja: 俺が何を見たか知ってるだろ

translation.en: I saw... the land.
- Horse, that you? -
Look, just bring it in slow, okay? I don't have all day.
-  - Horse!
Just bring it up slow.
I said slow!
Shouldn't be doing that. You're gonna get in trouble.
translation.ja: 飲み過ぎは体に悪いわ

translation.en: Ha. That's right.
You're not afraid. You've got your pet freak comin' to rescue you.
translation.ja: あの化け物が 助けに来ると思ってんだろ

translation.en: He's not a freak, and he can take you anytime.
He's killed dozens of people, and he doesn't have any mercy or anything.
translation.ja: たくさん殺してる 情け容赦ないのよ

translation.en: He even kills little girls.
Haven't we all?
Shit.
It's Horse.
Find him. Find him! Come on!
translation.ja: 奴を捜せ　捜すんだ！

translation.en: -  - Yes! Yes! Yes!
Come on. Gettin' nervous, aren't you?
translation.ja: 来やがれ ビビってる？

translation.en: I don't get nervous.
And if there's a river, we'll dam it.
translation.ja: 川があれば ダムを造る

translation.en: And if there's a tree, we'll ram it.
'Cause I'm talkin' progress here.
Yes, sir. I'm talkin' development.
translation.ja: 輝かしい未来が待ってる

translation.en: Yeah! For we shall suck and savor...
translation.ja: 豊かな生活が送れる 素晴らしい土地 ドライランドで

translation.en: the sweet flavor of Dryland.
translation.ja: 素晴らしい土地 ドライランドで

translation.en: Face is all red.
Helen said with anybody that has a face that red,
translation.ja: ヘレンが言った 顔が赤いのは―

translation.en: he's either had too much sun or too much to drink.
translation.ja: 日焼けし過ぎか 飲み過ぎ

translation.en: All right, that's it. I'm gonna burn your face. Almost time.
translation.ja: お前の顔を焼いてやる 時間だ

translation.en: -  What's up? - We're just talkin' about our friend.
translation.ja: どうした？ おしゃべりを

translation.en: What's his name?  He doesn't have a name.
So death can't find him.
translation.ja: 死神も見つけられない

translation.en: Doesn't have a home or people to care for.
translation.ja: 家もないし仲間もいない

translation.en: He's not afraid of anything, men least of all.
translation.ja: 何も恐れない 失うものもない

translation.en: He's fast and strong like a big wind.
translation.ja: 何も恐れない 失うものもない 風のように速くて強い

translation.en: He can hear a hundred miles and see a hundred miles underwater.
translation.ja: 水中で何百キロも先が見え 聞こえる

translation.en: He can hide in the shadow of the noon sun.
translation.ja: 水中で何百キロも先が見え 聞こえる 姿を隠して―

translation.en: He could be right behind you, and you won't even know it till you're dead!
translation.ja: 背後に忍び寄って敵を殺す

translation.en: Give it a rest.
He'll come for me. He will.
Well, I hope he does.  The Lord's creation.
Remember you said that.
Look at us here today.  Yeah!
Dryland is not just our destination,
translation.ja: ドライランドは ただの目的地ではない

translation.en: - but it is our destiny! -
Find him. Find him!
How can I find... this glorious place?
translation.ja: その栄光の地を どうやって見つける？

translation.en: And he said to me--
A child shall lead you.
translation.ja: “１人の子供が 導いてくれる”

translation.en: A child.
- And behold! - It's time.
The instrument of our salvation!
Our guide in the wild.
Our beacon in the darkness.
Turn her around, Nord.
She has shown me the path!
And before the holy- most moment is upon us,
translation.ja: 聖なる瞬間を迎える前に―

translation.en: let's sacrifice one to old Saint Joe.
And let's get this tub of shit up to speed.
Yep.
Pull!
- Pull. - Pull!
So which way we rowin'? I don't have a goddamn clue.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 手掛かりがない

translation.en: Don't worry.
They'll row for a month before they figure out I'm fakin' it.
But, um, wh- wh--
Oh, you want details. Well, I'm not tellin' these savages...
translation.ja: 説明が要るか 解読してないことは 明かせない

translation.en: that we haven't solved the map yet.
translation.ja: 解読してないことは 明かせない

translation.en: I promised them results, and I'll get 'em if I gotta cut 'em out of her goddamn back.
translation.ja: 約束したんだ 皮を引きはがしてでも 解読する

translation.en: Who is that? Who is that?
Maybe one of the spare rowers?
Why aren't you rowin'?
- It's him. - It is him.
You guys are in so much trouble.
Well, I'll be damned. It's the gentleman guppy.
translation.ja: 何てこった しつこい魚野郎だ

translation.en: You know, he's like a turd that won't flush.
I want the girl.
You know, I thought you were stupid, friend.
translation.ja: 俺はお前が愚かだと 思っていたが―

translation.en: But I underestimated you.
You are a total freakin' retard.
I want the girl. That's all.
translation.ja: 望みは その子だけだ

translation.en: Well, what on this screwed- up earth makes you think you're gonna get her?
translation.ja: おめおめ渡すと 思ってるのか？

translation.en: You know what this is?
I drop it, you burn.
We all burn. Now wait, wait, wait, wait.
translation.ja: みんな死ぬ 待て 待て

translation.en: Let's not do anything rash here.
I mean, uh, are you sure she's worth all this?
She never does stop talkin'. She never shuts up.
I noticed. What is it then?
translation.ja: 知ってる 何が目的だ？

translation.en: Huh? It's the map.
translation.ja: 何が目的だ？ 地図だろ

translation.en: She's my friend.
Golly gee. A single tear rolls down my cheek.
translation.ja: 一滴の涙が頬を伝うよ

translation.en: I mean, you're gonna die for your friend.
translation.ja: 友達のために死ぬとは

translation.en: If it comes to that.
- He's bluffing. I'll kill him. - He's not bluffing. He never bluffs.
translation.ja: ハッタリだ そんなことしないわ

translation.en: Shut up!
I don't-- I- I-- I don't think you're gonna drop that torch, my friend.
translation.ja: お前がそれを落とすとは 思えん

translation.en: - Why not? - Because you're not crazy.
translation.ja: なぜだ？ イカれてない

translation.en: No!
Oh, thank God.
Get him!
Let's go, goddamn it!
Don't just stand there! Kill somethin'!
translation.ja: 突っ立ってるな　殺せ！

translation.en: Was this your big vision?
I've always wanted to drive this monster.
translation.ja: これを運転したかったんだ

translation.en: There he is! There he is!
That's him! There!
No! Let go!
Let go!
Let me go! Let go!  Pilot!
translation.ja: 放してよ！ パイロット　いないのか

translation.en: -  Pilot! -  Let me go!
translation.ja: パイロット　いないのか

translation.en: You should've stayed underwater.
Now you know how to fly an airplane? You're lucky I do.
translation.ja: 運がいいな　俺は操縦できる

translation.en: Ow! Now you stop it! You behave yourself now!
It's going down.
You can see it sinking. Gregor, bring us right down on top of it.
translation.ja: 沈んでいく グレゴール　真上に降ろせ

translation.en: Hurry, Gregor!  Don't worry.
Hurry.
Enola! Up here!
Grab on!
Are they on yet?
-  What is it? -  I don't know!
translation.ja: どうした？ 分からない

translation.en: No!
Gotcha! I'm gonna rip your cute little lungs out.
translation.ja: つかまえたぞ 肺をえぐり出してやる

translation.en: Pull! Almost.
-  -  No! Enola!
Saint Joe. Hole in one.
- Helen! -  No! Enola! -  Helen!
Hey! Hey!
Oh. Oh, no! Quick! What are we gonna do?
translation.ja: 大変だわ どうすればいいの？

translation.en: Tie this off.
-  Hurry! - Tie it!
- Got it! -  Ah!
Get 'em up now.
-  Of course! North is south. - What?
- South is north. - I was swimming.
I saw.  My friends.
My friends, look.
If I take a bearing from the sun and reverse the coordinates on Enola's back,
translation.ja: 太陽から見て 座標を逆さにすれば…

translation.en: then Dryland is that way.
translation.ja: ドライランドは あっちだ

translation.en: It's fresh!
All of this! It's fresh!
translation.ja: 真水だ 全部 真水だぞ！

translation.en: I found something!
Maybe we should put them under the dirt.
I think it was their way.
They must have known they were dying.
I'm home.
Where's the mariner? He was outside.
translation.ja: マリナーは？ 外にいた

translation.en: Wait. Wait! I want to show you this.
translation.ja: 待て　これを見せよう

translation.en: First time in your life you got nothin' to say?
Enola, I have to go now.
But you came back for me.
I like you.
Why are you leaving?
I don't belong here. I belong out there. You belong here.
translation.ja: 陸には向かない そんなことない

translation.en: It's too strange here. It doesn't move right.
Helen said that it's only land sickness.
We're all feeling it. It'll go away soon.
translation.ja: すぐ慣れるって言ってた

translation.en: It's more than that.
